title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 51.5 - Register of pilots in training and term of service
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 51.5 - Register of pilots in training and term of service

State Regulations
A register, or registers, of pilots in training shall be kept
by the secretary. The term of service of each pilot in training shall date from
the day upon which the applicant's acceptance is ordered by the commissioners
to be in effect and no person shall become a pilot in training without such
order. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
51.5

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
